**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 136 1.1 **Price** 10,000 gp **Usage** held in 2 hands **Bulk** L --- This exquisite fiddle is perfectly carved and balanced to produce the purest sound while granting its player perfect balance and poise. It grants a +2 item bonus to [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks. If you're a master in Performance, while playing it you also gain a +1 status bonus to Reflex saves and a +1 item bonus to Dexterity-based skill checks. If you're legendary in Performance, the bonuses are +2. When you [Perform](/Actions.aspx?ID=59) with the fiddle, you can choose to create a harsh and discordant note. You critically fail the Performance check, shred the strings of the fiddle, and create an 8th-level [_sound burst_](/Spells.aspx?ID=292), with a 40-foot emanation around you instead of a 10-foot burst. The fiddle can't be played again until the strings are replaced at a cost of 200 gp.
  • **Cantrips** [_dancing lights_](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [_ghost sound_](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [_message_](/Spells.aspx?ID=190)
  • **1st** [_command_](/Spells.aspx?ID=45)
  • **2nd** [_calm emotions_](/Spells.aspx?ID=31), [_faerie fire_](/Spells.aspx?ID=107)
  • **3rd** [_enthrall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=104)
  • **4th** [_glibness_](/Spells.aspx?ID=135)
  • **5th** [_sending_](/Spells.aspx?ID=272)
  • **6th** _calm emotions_, [_dominate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=87), [_vibrant pattern_](/Spells.aspx?ID=357)
  • **7th** _dominate_, [_prismatic spray_](/Spells.aspx?ID=233), [_true target_](/Spells.aspx?ID=346), _vibrant pattern_, [_visions of danger_](/Spells.aspx?ID=358)
**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
name: Fiddle of the Maestro
